data.title: CCFpams: Atmospheric stellar parameters from cross-correlation functions
data.name: CCFpams
data.description: Atmospheric Stellar Parameters from Cross-Correlation Functions for HARPS & HARPS-N

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "Download the .zip files or clone the repository. `harps_input2pams.f90` and `harpn_input2pams.f90` are the two FORTRAN90 codes to compute the stellar parameters from HARPS and HARPS-N data respectivel"
“CCFpams is a novel approach that allows the measurement of stellar temperature, metallicity and gravity within a few seconds and in a completely automated fashion.”
“In this repository the code to extract the parameters from HARPS and HARPS-N is provided.”
